Subject: Re: Escape (Double... rescue?-> MAximals and Predacons)
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=225937926; y=qBQHjonrUpvzjRcvvo1sh2I-1W8-_EJYMKD2qbwUiyXSOEn5lKuM

Azure looked around. Sea, sand, tall rocks and taller cliffs... Not
exactly a paradise vacation, but it would have to do. Perhaps he would
be able to refine some iron and enough silicon within a few decades so
he could repair the shuttle and join his group, but by then, his
mission won't be as necessary as it now was.

Just then, he smelled it. Metal, circuits, spark signatures. Where did
he land?

He transformed into a sleek and light dragon of an ice-cold blue, and
he took flight up to a towering cliff. Who exactly was coming along?

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "CatMaster o" <CatMastero@y...> wrote:
> "Yes my queen."  Inferno replied obediently.  He and Quickstrike
